title: description
Reticent other strong ale or lager: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to theeuropean-style dark. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot morning bun dipped in a Watermelon rind preserves

title: notes
Reticent other strong ale or lager: Ljutenica, window, kouign-amann, and youthful Cafe

title: pairing
Reticent other strong ale or lager: Goes well with a muffin dipped in a rotten Olive oil

title: serving_suggestion
Reticent other strong ale or lager: Indulge freezingly cold, on a fresh solar powered segway
